product_name: Marmot Camden Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's comfortable Marmot Camden Rain Jacket protects you from onslaughts of precipitation and wind. The length offers extra protection around the lower body. MemBrain(R) 2-layer waterproof, breathable laminated fabric fends off moisture and wind while reducing internal condensation, so you stay dry, warm and comfortable. Seam-taped construction offers complete protection. Hood rolls into collar when you don't need it; rib-knit lined collar holds in warmth. Drawcord hem and adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs help seal warmth in, weather out. Marmot Camden Rain Jacket for men has hand pockets and 2 zip chest pockets with water-resistant zippers; includes internal zippered media and drop-in pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The men's comfortable Marmot Camden Rain Jacket protects you from onslaughts of precipitation and wind. The length offers extra protection around the lower body.
